Description: Sherd from base of pottery plate (?). Fine red concentric lines on one side; deep grooves from wheel-made construction on other. Fabric with grey surfaces and red-brown core (2.5YR 5/6), with abundant siver mica inclusions.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p. 59 no. E 8 pl. 28.4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IA.23)
